  • Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.api used by com.stormpath.sdk.account 
    Class and Description
    ApiKey
    An ApiKey is a secure random username/password pair (called an id and secret) attributed to an Account that can be used by the account to make secure requests to an API service.
    ApiKeyCriteria
    An ApiKey-specific Criteria class, enabling an ApiKey-specific fluentquery DSL.
    ApiKeyList
    A CollectionResource containing ApiKey instances.
    ApiKeyOptions
    ApiKey-specific options that may be specified when retrieving ApiKey resources.
  • Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.api used by com.stormpath.sdk.api 
    Class and Description
    ApiAuthenticationResult
    An AuthenticationResult that indicates a client authenticated with your server-side API (eg REST API) using an ApiKey.
    ApiKey
    An ApiKey is a secure random username/password pair (called an id and secret) attributed to an Account that can be used by the account to make secure requests to an API service.
    ApiKeyBuilder
    A Builder design pattern used to construct ApiKey instances.
    ApiKeyCriteria
    An ApiKey-specific Criteria class, enabling an ApiKey-specific fluentquery DSL.
    ApiKeyOptions
    ApiKey-specific options that may be specified when retrieving ApiKey resources.
    ApiKeyStatus
    Represents the status (usability) of an ApiKey instance.
  • Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.api used by com.stormpath.sdk.application 
    Class and Description
    ApiKey
    An ApiKey is a secure random username/password pair (called an id and secret) attributed to an Account that can be used by the account to make secure requests to an API service.
    ApiKeyOptions
    ApiKey-specific options that may be specified when retrieving ApiKey resources.
    ApiRequestAuthenticator
    Authenticates an API HTTP Request and returns a result.
  • Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.api used by com.stormpath.sdk.application.webconfig
